entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -39.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Rapids Airport 09:56 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -39.8°C
Pressure: 104.5 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -43.9°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 60%
